member.name: HTTP_LISTEN_ENDPOINT_INFO
member.summary: Controls whether IP-based URLs should listen on the specific IP address or on a wildcard.

member.name: HTTP_LISTEN_ENDPOINT_INFO.Flags
member.summary: The structure that specifies if the property is present.

member.name: HTTP_LISTEN_ENDPOINT_INFO.EnableSharing
member.summary: A Boolean value that specifies whether sharing is enabled.
